data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Konya, Turkey today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Konya, Turkey

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Konya.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.section_summary: On average, 128 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Konya, Turkey.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, call those who are far off in Konya, Turkey, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Konya, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Arab, North Iraqi people. 0.1% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, make the 780 believers in Konya to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 2,078,420 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Konya, Turkey, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.section_summary:
the state of Konya, Turkey has a population of 2,079,200.

We estimate Konya has 780 people who might know Jesus, 11,640 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,066,780 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2,665 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Konya, Turkey and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.
